    • Method Detail

      • hasChannel

        boolean hasChannel(java.lang.String channelID)
        Determines whether or not the channel with the given identifier exists.
        Parameters:
        channelID - - channel identifier.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the channel exists, FALSE otherwise.

      • announce

        Broadcast a message on a given channel.
        Parameters:

        message - - message to broadcast.

      • emote

         org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Sends a message with a sender on a given channel.
        Parameters:
        channelID - - channel identifier.
        message - - message to broadcast.
        sender - - sender to include in the message.
